item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英特尔将裁员 20% 以上
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，英特尔将于本周公布裁员20%以上的计划。【原文：Intel is set to unveil plans this week to slash more than 20% of its workforce, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普后退，亚洲股市和美元反弹
item.description: 周三，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统表示不打算解雇美联储主席，并暗示将降低对中国的关税之后，亚洲股市出现了急需的缓解性反弹。【原文：Stock markets were enjoying a much-needed relief rally in Asia on Wednesday after President Donald Trump said he had no plans to fire the head of the Federal Reserve, and hinted at lower tariffs for China.】

item.title: 巴西 JBS 召开股东大会表决美国上市计划
item.description: 全球最大的肉类加工企业 JBS SA 在周二提交的一份证券文件中表示，该公司将于 5 月 23 日召开股东大会，就其股票在纽约证券交易所上市的计划进行投票表决。【原文：JBS SA , the world's largest meatpacker, called a shareholder meeting for May 23 to vote on its plan to list shares on the New York Stock Exchange, it said in a securities filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本工厂活动因关税问题萎缩，服务业回暖
item.description: 周三的一项私营部门调查显示，由于对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税政策的担忧，日本制造商的信心降至近五年来的最低点，日本工厂活动在四月份连续第十个月萎缩。【原文：Japan's factory activity shrank for the tenth consecutive month in April as confidence among manufacturers dived to almost 5-year lows, dented by worries about U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies, a private-sector survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 世界银行敦促降低股本与贷款比率，为穷国腾出资金
item.description: 鉴于欧洲和美国大幅削减发展援助，智库和其他团体正敦促世界银行降低其主要贷款机构的股本贷款比率，以腾出数十亿美元的额外贷款能力。【原文：Given big cuts in development aid by Europe and the United States, think tanks and other groups are urging the World Bank to reduce the equity-to-lending ratio of its main lending arm to free up billions in additional lending capacity.】

item.title: 马斯克称特斯拉 "擎天柱 "仿人机器人受中国稀土出口限制影响
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克周二表示，其 Optimus 人形机器人的生产受到了中国稀土磁铁出口限制的影响。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Tuesday that the production of its Optimus humanoid robots had been affected by China's export restrictions of rare earth magnets.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美国将争取英国将汽车关税从 10%降至 2.5
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府分发的一份文件草案知情人士的话报道称，美国将争取英国把汽车关税从 10%降至 2.5%。【原文：The United States will aim for Britain to reduce its automotive tariff from 10% to 2.5%, The Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people with knowledge of a draft document circulated by the administration of President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体推进加密货币支点和 ETF 计划
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）周二表示，该公司已达成一项具有约束力的协议，将推出包括加密货币在内的一系列零售投资产品，这是该公司向金融服务多元化发展的最新尝试。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's social media firm, Trump Media & Technology Group , said on Tuesday it had reached a binding agreement to roll out an array of retail investment products, including crypto, in its latest bid to diversify into financial services.】

item.title: 美国法院维持特朗普对一些小企业征收关税的效力
item.description: 美国一家联邦法院周二允许唐纳德-特朗普总统对一些小企业征收的关税暂时继续有效，称这些企业没有证明它们会立即受到新进口税的损害。【原文：A U.S. federal court on Tuesday allowed President Donald Trump's tariffs against a group of small businesses to remain in force for now, saying the businesses had not shown they would immediately be harmed by new taxes on imports.】

item.title: 世界经济论坛就举报指控对创始人克劳斯-施瓦布展开调查
item.description: 世界经济论坛周二宣布，在一封举报信指控其创始人克劳斯-施瓦布（Klaus Schwab）行为不当之后，该论坛已对其展开调查。【原文：The World Economic Forum announced on Tuesday that it has launched an investigation into its founder, Klaus Schwab, following a whistleblower letter alleging misconduct by the former chairman.】

item.title: 聚焦：现代钢铁公司 60 亿美元的美国投资引起投资者愤怒，考验首尔的关税战略
item.description: 3 月下旬，在韩国现代钢铁公司宣布在美国投资 60 亿美元后，投资者不断抨击现代钢铁公司的股票，该公司组织了一次与十几位投资者的电话会议，以平息对缺乏详细融资计划的项目的担忧。【原文：In late March, as investors kept hammering Hyundai Steel shares after the South Korean steelmaker announced a $6 billion investment in the U.S., the company organised a call with a dozen investors to calm nerves over the project that lacked detailed funding plans.】

item.title: 独家报道康菲石油公司计划裁员，作为广泛重组的一部分
item.description: 美国顶级油气生产商康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）周二表示，该公司计划裁员，因为该公司在斥资 230 亿美元收购竞争对手马拉松石油公司（Marathon Oil）之后，正在大力控制成本并精简业务。【原文：ConocoPhillips , a top U.S. oil and gas producer, plans to cut staff, the company said on Tuesday, amid a broad push to rein in costs and streamline operations after its $23 billion buyout of rival Marathon Oil.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第一季度结束时积压了 264 亿美元的订单
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周二在一份证券文件中称，截至 3 月底，该公司的订单积压额为 264 亿美元，比去年同期增长了 25%。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer said on Tuesday its order backlog ended the quarter through March at $26.4 billion, up 25% from a year earlier, according to a securities filing.】

item.title: 特朗普称如果中国不达成贸易协议，美国将设定条件
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，如果中国不同意达成贸易协议，美国将制定条款。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that if China does not agree to a deal on trade, the U.S. will set the terms.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州起诉 Snapchat 所有者，指控其使儿童上瘾并欺骗父母
item.description: 佛罗里达州周二起诉照片分享应用 Snapchat 的所有者 Snap，指控其非法使用使儿童上瘾的功能，并为 13 岁及以下儿童开设账户。【原文：Florida sued Snap , the owner of photo-sharing app Snapchat, on Tuesday, accusing it of illegally employing features that addict children and opening accounts for children age 13 and younger.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒以通胀风险为由支持稳定政策利率
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里亚娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周二表示，由于美国的进口关税大幅超出预期，并可能对物价造成上涨压力，央行应该维持短期借贷成本不变，直到通胀风险消退。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said on Tuesday that with U.S. import tariffs significantly larger than expected and likely to put upward pressure on prices, the central bank ought to keep short-term borrowing costs unchanged until inflation risks recede.】

item.title: Enphase Energy 季度利润不及预期，预计第二季度收入疲软
item.description: 受美国需求疲软的影响，太阳能逆变器制造商恩法斯能源公司（Enphase Energy）周二公布的第一季度利润低于分析师预期，第二季度营收也低于市场预期。【原文：Solar inverter maker Enphase Energy on Tuesday missed analysts' estimates for first-quarter profit, hit by softening U.S. demand, and forecast second-quarter revenue below market estimates.】

item.title: 特朗普不打算解雇美联储主席鲍威尔，但希望降低利率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，他不打算解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell），但他希望降低利率。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he has no plans to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, but said he wants interest rates to be lower, remarks that could defuse tensions over the central bank chief's future that have rattled investors.】

item.title: 墨西哥银行 Banorte 因贷款规模扩大，第一季度利润增长 8
item.description: 墨西哥银行 Banorte 周二公布第一季度利润增长 8%，原因是内部需求推动了贷款额的增长。【原文：Mexican lender Banorte reported first-quarter profits up 8% on Tuesday, as internal demand boosted its loan book growth.】

item.title: 白宫称贸易谈判步伐加快，IMF下调全球展望
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二表示，随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对几乎所有贸易伙伴征收的高额关税开始产生影响，未来几个月全球经济产出将放缓。【原文：Worldwide economic output will slow in the months ahead as U.S. President Donald Trump's steep tariffs on virtually all trading partners begin to bite, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday as global finance chiefs swarmed Washington seeking deals with Trump's team to lower the levies.】

item.title: 贝克休斯公布第一季度利润增长
item.description: 美国油田技术公司贝克休斯周二公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于国际市场和北美市场对其钻井设备和技术的持续需求。【原文：U.S. oilfield technology firm Baker Hughes beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by sustained demand for its drilling equipment and technology in international markets and North America.】

item.title: Capital One 第一季度利润因利息收入增加而增长
item.description: Capital One Financial 周二公布第一季度利润增长，原因是信用卡债务利息收入增加。【原文：Capital One Financial reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Tuesday, as the consumer lender was helped by a higher income from interest payments on its credit card debt.】

item.title: 直觉外科季度业绩超预期，引发关税担忧
item.description: 直觉外科公司（Intuitive Surgical）尽管第一季度利润和收入超过了华尔街的预期，但周二仍对关税对其年度业绩的潜在影响表示担忧。【原文：Intuitive Surgical raised concerns on Tuesday about the potential impact of tariffs on its annual results, despite exceeding Wall Street's first-quarter profit and revenue estimates.】

item.title: 交易日 股票反弹，特朗普不再抨击鲍威尔或发表贸易言论
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克迟迟未兑现的特斯拉承诺
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）长期以来一直雄心勃勃地许下诺言，但往往迟迟不能兑现。他的许多最伟大的想法仍在酝酿之中。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk has a long history of making ambitious promises and often delivering late. Many of his biggest ideas are still in the works.】

item.title: 美国汽车业警告新汽车零部件关税将导致价格上涨、销量减少
item.description: 美国汽车行业团体联盟敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统不要对进口汽车零部件征收25%的关税，并警告说这将减少汽车销量并提高价格。【原文：A coalition of U.S. auto industry groups urged President Donald Trump not to impose 25% tariffs on imported auto parts warning they would cut vehicle sales and raise prices.】

item.title: 德国软件制造商 SAP 第一季度营业利润超出预期
item.description: 德国软件制造商 SAP 周二公布，今年第一季度调整后营业利润为 25 亿欧元（28.6 亿美元），高于分析师的预期。【原文：German software maker SAP on Tuesday reported an adjusted operating profit of 2.5 billion euros ($2.86 billion) in the first quarter of the year that came in above analysts' estimates.】

item.title: 阿斯利康在缺席两年后重新加入美国主要药物游说团体
item.description: 美国药品研究与制造商协会（PhRMA）周二表示，阿斯利康在离开美国主要药品游说团体约两年后，已重新加入该团体。【原文：AstraZeneca has rejoined the main U.S. drug lobby group, roughly two years after leaving it, the Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America (PhRMA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，萨姆-奥特曼将卸任 Oklo 董事长一职
item.description: 据 CNBC 周二报道，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）将辞去核初创公司 Oklo 董事长一职，该公司股价盘后下跌 13%。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is stepping down as the chairman of nuclear startup Oklo , CNBC reported on Tuesday, sending its shares down 13% after the bell.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为 2026 年第二季度金价将突破 4000 美元/盎司
item.description: 摩根大通（JP Morgan）周二在一份报告中表示，随着美国关税和中美贸易战的加剧，经济衰退的可能性增加，金价将在明年突破每盎司4000美元的里程碑。【原文：JP Morgan sees gold prices crossing the $4,000 per ounce milestone next year, following increased recession probabilities amid boosted U.S. tariffs and an ongoing U.S.-China trade war, the bank said in a note on Tuesday.】
